He also stated that he had some issues with School Development Society and due to this
he was falsely implicated.  He finally stated that as  the Head of the Teachers' Association,
he  had some issues with the  School Development Association,  and it was  on account of

There  was  no  rhyme  or  reason  for
column2: the  victim  to  make  a  false  complaint  against  the

column1: falsely implicate her teacher for some extraneous reason.  In the circumstances the learned

the  offence  of  rape,  penile

column1: penetration is not an essential element of the offence of grave sexual abuse.
According  to Section  365(b)  of  the  Penal  Code  (as  amended by  the Act  No.22  of 1995)

column2: Grave Sexual Abuse is committed any person who, for sexual gratification, does any act, by
